data.title: nigel cole on LinkedIn: #anchor #paisley #scotland #textile #thread
data.meta_description: This evening, I am reporting on the #Anchor Mills complex in #Paisley, SW #Scotland which formed part of a global #textile and #thread manufacturing business…
data.text:
“Don’t worry about the Mill delivery being late, we can pick it up from stockist to fill the gaps” 😥 “Ok, so the Mill price is very good, and we only have to pay the higher price from the stockists occasionally, so overall its worthwhile.” 😏 “We can buy from the Mill and the stock is there ready for us, in our unit, we have control. No stress over price fluctuations or shortages in the stockists as we paid for it all up front, that’s stability for the whole year.” 😎 If these are the #benefits you are currently getting from your #supplychain then I am sure you won’t need us at Smiths Nottingham (Smiths Metal Centres Ltd) 🤐 🤐 🤐 You don’t need any help with reducing #stocks, easing #cashflow or building a sustainable and efficient #supplychain, so please move on and ignore this message. #livingthedream 😉 Anybody else please get in touch with to discuss how we can help you. shippamb@smithmetal.com 💪 🎅 🎄 🎅 🎄 ☃ 🎁 #ukmanufacturing #metals #plastics #rawmaterials #manufacturing #machining #engineering #doingitdifferent #xmas #merrychristmas #happyholidays 🎅

At Oliver Rubber Industries LLP, we're taking a moment today to honor the indomitable spirit of Mahatma Gandhi. At our company, Oliver Rubber Industries LLP, we think a lot about Gandhi's words. Just like he believed in simple living, we make rubber things that are good and long-lasting. Because of Gandhi, we want to do our best always. We make our rubber items with a lot of care, thinking about our planet. We would like to encourage you to move your conveyor operations to the next level. Discover more about our offerings at (https://oliverllp.com/). 🤝 Let's drive efficiency together. 🌍Want to see the things we make? Price is set by supply, demand, and what the market will bear. Sure, there are businesses in every industry that try to go “cheap,” but they seldom survive because of a clear lack of business knowledge. In fact, recent feedback from powder coaters around the United States show that most of them are running 30% + AFTER tax profits. These numbers are unheard of in many industries. Were you aware that the inaugural conveyor belt system was conceptualized in 1892? 🤔 👨🏽🏫 It was Thomas Robins who devised the optimal solution for swiftly transporting hefty loads such as coal and ores at Thomas Edison’s Ore-Milling Company in Ogdensburg, New Jersey. 🤝 Historical evidence suggests that the conveyor belt mechanism found its application in the production industry a bit earlier: In 1804, the British Navy savored delicious cookies produced by the first steam-operated conveyors. Venturing even further back, ancient conveyor belt mechanisms were employed to transfer agricultural products from shore to ship. In contemporary times, conveyor belts have become an indispensable component in the majority of production or packaging lines. At Passaic, we recognize that high quality and durability are essential attributes of industrial conveyor belt products. Thus, we present state-of-the-art belts that can be tailored to meet the preferences of our clients. 👉Find more @ https://lnkd.in/efGT622m

🎉 𝗪𝗲'𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝘀𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗺𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝗰𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗻𝗲𝘄𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗼𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂!🎉 At Omco Metals, we've been working together with Sirris to develop an innovative material that caters to the market's needs for high-temperature applications, without breaking the bank. 🔥 Rising to the Challenge: As the demand for cost-effective casting materials with top-notch performance increased, we knew it was time to find an equivalent alternative. 💡 The Journey Behind the Solution: Our journey was both challenging and rewarding, involving several essential steps: 1️⃣ On-Site Test Castings: With the support of Sirris experts, we conducted meticulous test castings on-site to gather valuable insights. 2️⃣ Exploring the Right Mix: In parallel, our talented team explored various compositions to find the perfect match for the desired properties. 3️⃣ Putting It to the Test: We ran multiple test campaigns, leaving no stone unturned to achieve the desired properties. 🌟 Presenting the Result: We are proud to introduce our new castable aluminium-alloyed cast iron, a material that shines even under high-temperature conditions. With this solution, Omco Metals aims to offer an effective and affordable answer to both our clients and the market. 🙌 A Team Effort: This achievement would not have been possible without the hard work and dedication of our team and the support from our valued partner. Join us in celebrating this significant milestone and stay tuned for more exciting developments to come! 👉 Discover all our products via https://lnkd.in/eypW59wj #OmcoMetals #Innovation #Collaboration #NewSolution #HighTemperatureMaterials #TeamEffort #ExcitingNews

Packaging Process ： The flocking process 👇 Definition: The method of fixing short fibers (generally 0.03~0.5cm in length) vertically on a substrate coated with an adhesive is called flocking. 👍 Principle: The principle of flocking is to use the physical characteristics of charge homosexual repulsion opposite-sex attraction, so that the villi with a negative charge, the object that needs to be flocked is placed under zero potential or grounding conditions, the villi is attracted by the hetero potential by the plant body, and accelerates vertically to the surface of the object that needs flocking, because the plant body is coated with adhesive, the fluff is vertically glued to the plant body. Classification: flocking machine assembly line flocking, box flocking, sprinkler flocking Process flow: For different application fields, the substrate materials used for flocking are very different, the varieties of fluff are different, and the equipment is different, but the production and processing process is similar. 👍 The flocking process flow is simply expressed as follows: feeding→ sizing→ flocking → drying→ bristles→ finishing → finished products #packaging #package #packagingprocess #flocking

🔧 Optimize Your TCO with Schurco Slurry Pumps! 🌟 In heavy industry, Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) is crucial. Schurco Slurry® pumps excel in reducing TCO by offering durable, high-quality pumps that last longer and cost less in the long run. Key Benefits: Durability: Pumps made with wear parts greater than 650 Brinell hardness for extended lifespan. Efficiency: Handles the toughest materials like sand, gravel, coal, and tailings with ease. Cost-Effective: Lower operation and maintenance costs compared to ANSI and non-slurry rated alternatives. Interchangeability: Schurco® parts are fully compatible with Warman® parts, ensuring seamless integration and availability. Reliable Support: High inventory levels and prompt spare parts delivery guarantee minimal downtime. Trust Schurco Slurry® for sustainable partnerships and unbeatable value cycle after cycle. 🚀 #HeavyIndustry #SchurcoSlurry #TotalCostOfOwnership #EfficientPumping #MiningEquipment #IndustrialSolutions #Durability #CostEffective #PartnershipsMatter #IndustrialMachinery #InnovativeEngineering #AbrasiveMaterials #MaterialHandlingSolutions
